author: Marianne Garvey, CNN
title: Kiefer Sutherland remembers his mom Shirley Douglas
description: Kiefer Sutherland paid tribute to his mom, actress Shirley Douglas, who died over the weekend, Sutherland said.
content:
(CNN)Kiefer Sutherland paid tribute to his mom, actress Shirley Douglas, who died over the weekend, Sutherland said. 
"Early this morning my mother, Shirley Douglas, passed away due to complications surrounding pneumonia (not related to COVID19)," Sutherland… [+650 chars]
